attributes.action: keep the access road to dengemarsh open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the access road to dengemarsh, kent should be left open to the public. the only road to this beach has been closed leaving no other way to access this public beach. this is a well known angling spot all year round and we believe this road being closed is the latest of a long line of beach access being closed to the public. any access by car should be left open as its the only way disabled people can get to this beach.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
